availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Theophilus Cooksey (Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter and veteran)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter and veteran. Maryland native. Married to Narcissa L. Harris Cooksey on June 13, 1821. Father of Albert G. Cooksey. Served in the War of 1812. Carpenter in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860. Resident of Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1861.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 320; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 50; Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages to 1850 Ancestry, Caldwell County, Kentucky, June 13, 1821; Find A Grave, "Theophilus Cooksey (1784-1868)," Memorial #19094305, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19094305 (accessed June 18, 2017); KYR-0001-029-0529.
